name: Lilac Labs
headline: We automate the person taking orders at drive-thrus with a voice AI
description:
At Lilac, we automate the person taking order at the drive thru with a voice AI. We're building this for Quick Service Restaurants (QSRs) dealing with an historical labor shortage and rising wages.

Previous attempts at drive-thru voice ordering are costly to implement and have failed to deliver the accuracy and latency needed. It's now possible to build a voice interface that passes the threshold for a great customer experience.

In the United States, there are 200,000 Drive-Thrus handling 6 Billion visits a year. At 3 minutes per order, that's 34,000 human years spent on taking orders annually. Per location, on average we can deliver around $100,000 of value in terms of labor savings, upsell revenue lift, and training costs.

founders.name: Tony Kam, Co-Founder / CEO
founders.description:
Tony is the co-founder and CEO of Lilac Labs. Tony studied EECS at UC Berkeley where focus on operating systems. 

Before Lilac, Tony worked at Tesla as an engineer, where he owned the display and touch component of the infotainment system. Tony also worked on the performance and reliability of driving visualization. Prior to that, Tony worked on manufacturing automation at Intel and robotics simulation at CloudMinds.

founders.name: Shelden Shi, Co-Founder / CTO
founders.description:
Shelden is the Co-Founder and CTO of Lilac Labs. Shelden studied CS and CogSci at UC Berkeley, where he conducted research training ML models to predict emotions via audio data. 

Before Lilac, Shelden was the founding engineer at Symbolic, leading the development of a Fintech lending platform with ~$1B in AUM and 30k monthly active users. Prior to that, Shelden worked at Flatiron Health, an oncology data unicorn, where he trained and built the evaluation pipeline for cancer diagnostic models.

# AI Drive-Thru Voice Automation
Lilac Voice is an AI team member that takes orders at your drive-thru.
[View Demo](https://www.drive-thru.ai/</request-a-demo>)[Learn More](https://www.drive-thru.ai/<#learn-more>)
![Drive-thru sign prominently displayed on a black stand with white text and arrows pointing left, directing traffic towards the drive-thru lane. The background features cars and buildings, indicating a busy urban setting.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6689ee39013a3dee5905bb1d/669e0e42d41779e7fce202f0_Frame%2066.png)
![Person sitting in a car at a drive-thru menu board, viewed from behind with their hair in a ponytail, looking at the menu options ahead through the car window.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6689ee39013a3dee5905bb1d/669e0e514cf6f041aceff378_Frame%2065.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6689ee39013a3dee5905bb1d/6689ee39013a3dee5905bc29_circle-yellow-pastel-x-webflow-template.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6689ee39013a3dee5905bb1d/6689ee39013a3dee5905bc27_circle-octagon-pastel-x-webflow-template.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6689ee39013a3dee5905bb1d/6689ee39013a3dee5905bc28_circle-blue-pastel-x-webflow-template.svg)
## Lilac Voice AI is the most effective way to modernize your Drive-Thru.
There is no upfront investment or crazy initial build-out fee. Super easy to enable. It seamlessly integrates with your existing tech. Transform your operations with minimal friction and maximum value. 
### No Hardware Purchase.
Lilac Voice integrates seamlessly with your existing drive-thru communication system and POS system. No extra hardware needed.
![Mobile App - Pastel X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6689ee39013a3dee5905bb1d/6689ee39013a3dee5905bc37_icon-mobile-app-pastel-x-webflow-template.svg)
### No AI Model Build Out Fee.
Lilac Voice is trained to understand your menu, ingredients, and dietary information. No extra costs for AI model setup.
![A purple audio graphic](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6689ee39013a3dee5905bb1d/6698d2322f583b0866d78e22_audioEmoji33x33.png)
### One-Click Activation
Activate Lilac Voice in your drive-thru with a simple click. Start benefiting from advanced AI technology immediately.
![A yellow speech bubble](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6689ee39013a3dee5905bb1d/6698d37b668b6d07129f58da_SpeechEmoji33x33.png)
[View Demo](https://www.drive-thru.ai/</request-a-demo>)
## We have the most intelligent Drive-Thru Voice AI on the market.
Transforming Drive-Thru Experience with 98% Order Accuracy, Instant Response, and Smart Adaptability.
![Person in a car receiving a brown paper bag with food from a drive-thru attendant, smiling and looking pleased with the service.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6689ee39013a3dee5905bb1d/669dc88ac48764c28cd82c09_Smiley1096x756.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6689ee39013a3dee5905bb1d/6689ee39013a3dee5905bcbc_circle-blue-pastel-x-webflow-template.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6689ee39013a3dee5905bb1d/6689ee39013a3dee5905bcc3_circle-yellow-octagon-pastel-x-webflow-template.svg)
98%
### Orders without intervention
0.8s
### human-like response time
### Accurately handles order modifications
### Understands store policy and dietary restrictions
## Why use Lilac Voice AI at your Drive-Thru?
![Download Our App - Pastel X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6689ee39013a3dee5905bb1d/6689ee39013a3dee5905bc52_icon-download-our-app-pastel-x-webflow-template.svg)
### 1. Save Labor Costs
Lilac Voice AI handles order-taking and freeing up your staff to focus on other critical tasks. Managers can optimize workforce allocation and labor efficiency.
![Start investing - Pastel X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6689ee39013a3dee5905bb1d/6689ee39013a3dee5905bc51_icon-start-investing-pastel-x-webflow-template.svg)
### 2. Boost Revenue
Lilac Voice consistently offers relevant upselling opportunities, driving higher check sizes and enhancing your revenue.
![Create An Account - Pastel X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6689ee39013a3dee5905bb1d/6689ee39013a3dee5905bc53_icon-create-an-account-pastel-x-webflow-template.svg)
### 3. Enhance Customer Experience 
Lilac Voice ensures zero wait times, providing faster speed of service and accurate order-taking.
## From the Lilac Team
[![We're backed by YCombinator!](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6689ee39013a3dee5905bc18/6696d5f79d7f19c024da3da0_YCPhoto1192x672.png)We're backed by YCombinator!Excited to announce that we are backed by Silicon Valley startup accelerator YCombinator.Update](https://www.drive-thru.ai/<#>)
[![Enabling support for HME NEXEO](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6689ee39013a3dee5905bc18/669757e9f2ccfdb6f86dc144_HME1192x672.png)Enabling support for HME NEXEOThe team has been hard at work. We've integrated with HME's NEXEO platform.Update](https://www.drive-thru.ai/<#>)
[![Integration Partnership with PAR Brink POS](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6689ee39013a3dee5905bc18/6697584a0a032e50ffeae822_BrinkPOS1192x672.png)Integration Partnership with PAR Brink POSLilac Voice is now supported on PAR's Brink POS.Update](https://www.drive-thru.ai/<#>)
## Tailored to Your Needs.
Lilac’s AI system is designed to be as flexible as your operations demand. Whether you need it for peak hours, specific shifts, or as a consistent part of your drive-thru service, Lilac adapts to your needs effortlessly.
### Peak Hour Assistance
Deploy Lilac during your busiest times to manage high order volumes efficiently.
![Mobile App - Pastel X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6689ee39013a3dee5905bb1d/6689ee39013a3dee5905bc37_icon-mobile-app-pastel-x-webflow-template.svg)
### Off-Peak Efficiency
Use the AI during slower periods to maintain consistent service levels without overstaffing.
![A purple audio graphic](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6689ee39013a3dee5905bb1d/6698d2322f583b0866d78e22_audioEmoji33x33.png)
### Manager Control
With a simple interface, you can easily toggle the AI on and off as needed. Fit Lilac into your unique operational strategy.
![A yellow speech bubble](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6689ee39013a3dee5905bb1d/6698d37b668b6d07129f58da_SpeechEmoji33x33.png)
[View Demo](https://www.drive-thru.ai/</request-a-demo>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Lilac Labs**

Founded in 2024, Lilac Labs operates at the cutting edge of tech in the Quick Service Restaurant (QSR) space. The mission? To revolutionize the drive-thru ordering process through voice AI. With a founding team of just two and support from Y Combinator's Batch S24, Lilac Labs is positioned to tackle a significant challenge: the labor shortages and rising wages affecting QSRs by automating the human element in order-taking.

**The Problem**

Currently, there are roughly 200,000 drive-thrus in the U.S., accommodating a staggering 6 billion visits annually. These drive-thrus collectively consume an astounding 34,000 human years in order-taking every year. Past solutions for automating this process have proven too costly and inefficient, lacking the necessary accuracy and response speed to maintain a positive customer experience. 

**The Solution: Lilac Voice**

Enter Lilac Voice. This AI-driven tool is designed to seamlessly integrate with existing drive-thru systems, minimizing friction while maximizing efficiency. Notably, it doesn't require any hardware purchases or complex AI model build-outs—it's as simple as a one-click activation. The AI is capable of accurate order-taking with an impressive 98% accuracy rate and a response time of just 0.8 seconds, effectively handling order modifications and understanding store policies and dietary restrictions.

**The Value Proposition**

Lilac Voice aims to deliver around $100,000 in value per location per year, thanks to labor savings and increased upsell opportunities. With the ability to deploy this AI tool flexibly—either during peak hours or off-peak times—managers can better allocate their workforce and enhance overall service efficiency.

**What's Next?**

The team at Lilac Labs is actively developing partnerships and integrations to enhance their service. They’ve recently partnered with HME NEXEO and PAR's Brink POS, ensuring that their AI solution is supported across platforms. With only two employees, the agility of Lilac Labs means they can pivot quickly and adapt to the dynamic needs of the QSR industry.

**Conclusion**

In a landscape where speed, efficiency, and customer satisfaction are paramount, Lilac Labs stands out as a potential game-changer. Their focus on leveraging AI for enhancing drive-thru operations not only addresses pressing labor challenges but also innovates how QSRs interact with their customers. For those invested in the future of fast food, Lilac Labs is definitely a company to watch. 

For further information, visit [Lilac Labs](https://www.drive-thru.ai/).
